Luxurious Toctona Resort 25 Acers Teak Jungle is situated at Andigama.
column6: DescriptionLuxurious Toctona Resort 25 Acers Teak Jungle is situated at Andigama.Itâs about 2hrs drive from Colombo and has a wide carpeted road and the final 1km is through a 20-feet-wide natural road. This is situated in the middle of a 25-acre mature teak jungle. The teak plantation is 20 years old and has in excess of 5000 trees which are well-maintained. The land is fully protected by a very strong 8 feet height fence.In addition to teak, the land is fed with in excess of 200 mature cashew trees, which are all developed and a lot of cashew can be gathered every year. The land has a wide range of various nearby tropical natural products like mango, orange, beli, Jambu,Veralu,dam,etc. It has a huge man-made lake with an enormous water supply for any estate reason, which is encircled by many "Kumbuk" trees. It never runs out of water over time. All downpour water from the structure is depleted to this water supply. It has a deep well, of which the water is of great quality and furthermore has a 200 feet tube well.The hotel initially worked for the individual utilization of the proprietor however later opened for the visitors. It has 5 air-conditioned rooms with all the luxury conveniences. The property has an enormous open lobby outfitted with tables and seats totally made from normal wood and it has an ability to oblige 100 individuals. The corridor is joined to a huge pantry and it further prompts one more enormous kitchen with all utensils and wood stove. The kitchen is outfitted with all cooking tools, pots and so forth, many gas cookers, fridge, cooler, numerous capacity cabinets, hot and cool water dispenser, and some more. The kitchen is connected to two rooms and a joined washroom for labourers and another extra storage room.The most appealing piece of this property is the pool. This is a one-of-a-kind pool that has an irregular look with no shape and is not tiled. It's totally made of concrete cut and polished innovation and added with a characteristic look of water tumbling from a stone rock. There is a pool house with two washrooms made to mix with nature.The property has three phase power supply from the main grid and two single phase connections (One for the pool and the other for a different staff quarters.) The property is outfitted with a 5 KVA reinforcement diesel generator brought from the UK.It also has few quad bikes/beach bikes, mini jeep, many Japanese foot bikes and target shooting as outdoor activities and a tractor for transport within the premises and also for grass and bush cutting. For entertainment, itâs equipped with a karaoke set up with a good sound system, It has a separate newly built house with two bed rooms and living hall with an attached bathroom which can be used as staff/drivers accommodation. There are many âdonkey bedsâ for extra people to sleep.   There is a large garden in front of the building for playing and there is a large Buddha statue which is sheltered well.120 Million Don't Miss This Offer

column6: DescriptionLuxurious Toctona Resort 25 Acers Teak Jungle is situated at Andigama.Itâs about 2hrs drive from Colombo and has a wide carpeted road and the final 1km is through a 20-feet-wide natural road. This is situated in the middle of a 25-acre mature teak jungle. The teak plantation is 20 years old and has in excess of 5000 trees which are well-maintained. The land is fully protected by a very strong 8 feet height fence.In addition to teak, the land is fed with in excess of 200 mature cashew trees, which are all developed and a lot of cashew can be gathered every year. The land has a wide range of various nearby tropical natural products like mango, orange, beli, Jambu,Veralu,dam,etc. It has a huge man-made lake with an enormous water supply for any estate reason, which is encircled by many "Kumbuk" trees. It never runs out of water over time. All downpour water from the structure is depleted to this water supply. It has a deep well, of which the water is of great quality and furthermore has a 200 feet tube well.The hotel initially worked for the individual utilization of the proprietor however later opened for the visitors. It has 5 air-conditioned rooms with all the luxury conveniences. The property has an enormous open lobby outfitted with tables and seats totally made from normal wood and it has an ability to oblige 100 individuals. The corridor is joined to a huge pantry and it further prompts one more enormous kitchen with all utensils and wood stove. The kitchen is outfitted with all cooking tools, pots and so forth, many gas cookers, fridge, cooler, numerous capacity cabinets, hot and cool water dispenser, and some more. The kitchen is connected to two rooms and a joined washroom for labourers and another extra storage room.The most appealing piece of this property is the pool. This is a one-of-a-kind pool that has an irregular look with no shape and is not tiled. It's totally made of concrete cut and polished innovation and added with a characteristic look of water tumbling from a stone rock. There is a pool house with two washrooms made to mix with nature.The property has three phase power supply from the main grid and two single phase connections (One for the pool and the other for a different staff quarters.) The property is outfitted with a 5 KVA reinforcement diesel generator brought from the UK.It also has few quad bikes/beach bikes, mini jeep, many Japanese foot bikes and target shooting as outdoor activities and a tractor for transport within the premises and also for grass and bush cutting. For entertainment, itâs equipped with a karaoke set up with a good sound system, It has a separate newly built house with two bed rooms and living hall with an attached bathroom which can be used as staff/drivers accommodation. There are many âdonkey bedsâ for extra people to sleep.   There is a large garden in front of the building for playing and there is a large Buddha statue which is sheltered well.120 Million Don't Miss This Offer
